title: Will Packer interview and more
itunes:title: Will Packer interview and more
description:
Today on the show friend to the room, Will Packer stopped by and spoke about his new documentary "The Atlanta Child Murders" and more. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Alan Maloney, (the high school wrestling referee, who forced a teen to cut his dreadlocs or forfeit a wrestling match)  because he his filing a lawsuit, claiming that he suffered “emotional distress” and “defamation of character” in the aftermath of the incident. Also, Angela Yee helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show friend to the room, Will Packer stopped by and spoke about his new documentary "The Atlanta Child Murders" and more. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Alan Maloney, (the high school wrestling referee, who forced a teen to cut his dreadlocs or forfeit a wrestling match)  because he his filing a lawsuit, claiming that he suffered “emotional distress” and “defamation of character” in the aftermath of the incident. Also, Angela Yee helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
